title: nf-core/panoramaseq pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

N_barcodes.description: Number of barcodes for this sample

barcode_file.description: Path to barcode file for this sample

sample_size.description: Number of reads to subsample with seqtk for this sample (optional). If not set, SEQTK_SAMPLE will be skipped for this sample.

len_barcode.description: Length of barcode for this sample

Ntriage.description: Triage value Ntriage for this sample
